content.title: JavaScript

content.description: Explanation of asynchronous programming in JavaScript and a small example program.

content.description: Understand the order of execution for `console.log`, `setTimeout`, and `Promise`.

content.description: Compare `Promise` and `await` in JavaScript for handling asynchronous operations.

content.description: Compare `Observables` and `async` functions, and their usage in JavaScript.

content.title: Subscribe and Unsubscribe
content.description: Understanding subscription management and handling unsubscriptions.

content.description: Explain the `call()`, `apply()`, and `bind()` methods and their use cases.

content.title: Closures in JavaScript
content.description: Concept and examples of closures in JavaScript.

content.description: Compare `var`, `let`, and `const` for variable declaration in JavaScript.

content.title: Class vs Functional Component (Performance)
content.description: Comparison of class components and functional components in terms of performance.

content.title: How Hooks Help Over Lifecycle Methods
content.description: How React hooks offer advantages over traditional lifecycle methods.

content.title: Virtual DOM
content.description: Explanation of how the Virtual DOM works in React and its benefits.

content.description: Understanding Redux for state management, including Redux with Thunk or Redux Saga.

content.description: How to handle routing in React applications using libraries like `react-router-dom`.

content.title: Framework Expertise
content.description: Knowledge about frameworks like Express in Node.js.

content.description: Managing Create, Read, Update, Delete operations in Node.js.

content.description: Explanation of streams in Node.js and their usage.

content.description: Managing multiple processes in Node.js using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS for load balancing.

content.description: Comparison of SQL and NoSQL databases in terms of structure, flexibility, and use cases.
